about_the_game:
🎅 Work Hard. Play Santa. 🎄

Ever wished you could save Christmas while crunching spreadsheets or watching cat videos?

Well, now you can! Santa Gamepaper is here to make multitasking merry with a game that runs seamlessly at the bottom of your screen. You’ll be juggling cookies, presents, and productivity like a holiday pro!

✨ What’s in the Sack?

  • WASD Your Way to Victory! Guide Santa as he dashes through snowy fields.

  • Mouse-Toss Presents! Aim, throw, and watch those naughty kids magically turn nice.

  • Collect All the Cookies! Because Santa deserves snacks too.

  • Unlock Santa’s Sleigh! Save reindeers by helping good kids. Unlock the sleigh to zoom across the snow and collect cookies even faster!

  • Work-Friendly Fun! Run the game right on your desktop while pretending to send emails.

  • Holiday Spirit Everywhere! Snow, sparkles, and Santa—it’s all here.

Whether you’re procrastinating or multitasking like a Christmas champion, Santa Gamepaper is the perfect way to spread joy without missing a deadline. Save Christmas one cookie at a time—and maybe even keep your boss in the dark! 🎁🍪

Stop reading, start playing, and let Santa bring the holiday cheer! 🎅

name: Santa Gamepaper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (DirectX 11)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: 🎅 The ONLY game where you pretend to work while Santa runs, munches cookies, and hurls presents at naughty kids! Play discreetly at the bottom of your screen, multitask like a holiday boss, and save Christmas one cookie at a time. 🍪🎁
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
